position: Senior Analyst at ICRA ANALYTICS | Structured Finance l Securitization

experience.title: Senior Associate Analyst
experience.description: To perform data scrubbing, verification and validation of new and existing debts across different structured finance asset classes against performance reports in customer proprietary software/database. The activity entails updating complex cash flow models over the performance cycle with accuracy and within the required TAT.Key Responsibilities:• Review new and existing debts along their corresponding metrics and ensure compliance test results are aligned with periodic performance reports • Analyse complex cash flow models.• Deliver timely and error-free models• Maintain logs and records as per project specifications.

The activity entails updating complex cash flow models over the performance cycle with accuracy and within the required TAT.Key Responsibilities:• Review new and existing debts along their corresponding metrics and ensure compliance test results are aligned with periodic performance reports • Analyse complex cash flow models.• Deliver timely and error-free models• Maintain logs and records as per project specifications.

experience.title: Process Associate P2P Analyst

experience.title: Tax Analyst
experience.description: prepared Bank Reconciliation Statements, Vouching and verification of financial statements, analysed financial records to find errors and rectification of errors, Income tax returns for individual, HUF, Proprietor, Audit Partners, Partnership & Computation of income tax liability, Gst Registration, Gst Returns, Roc Compliances and assisted in auditing.

experience.title: Equity Research Analyst
experience.description: I have worked as an Equity Research Analyst in FMEP.1.Live stock trading for 2 months and to build an optimal portfolio based on market analysis.2.Managed and maintained a real-time simulated portfolio on BSE 500 listed companies.3.Did Porter's Five Forces Analysis of Banking/Finance & Pharmaceutical Industry.4.Prepared Research Report on Companies like Dr. Reddy's Laboratories, Dr Lal PathLabs, Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd, IDFC FIRST Bank Ltd.
